title: Systematic Corruption Investigation: Congressional Obstruction and Separation of Powers Violations (2025)
summary: Comprehensive investigation into Congressional Obstruction and Separation of Powers Violations (2025) reveals coordinated patterns of institutional capture and systematic corruption. Document systematic violations of separation of powers including congressional oversight obstruction, subpoena defiance, witness intimidation, and the breakdown of constitutional checks and balances. Trump Tyranny Tracker revealed extensive patterns of executive branch contempt for congressional authority and democratic oversight. This investigation documents specific mechanisms, coordination patterns, and systematic approaches to undermining democratic institutions.
